faq.a1: Omen requires iPhone 15 or 16 with iOS 17.0 or later. The ESP32 wearable display is optional and sold separately.
faq.q2: How does the wearable display work?
faq.a2: The ESP32 display connects via Bluetooth LE and shows translations in real-time, allowing for discreet, hands-free reading.
faq.a3: Omen requires an internet connection for AI transcription and translation. We're exploring offline capabilities for future releases.

translationPage.title: Translation
translationPage.subtitle: Real-time speech translation for every situation

travel.title: Travel & Tourism
travel.challenge: Travelers struggle to communicate in foreign countries, missing authentic experiences and facing difficulties with directions, dining, and local interactions.
travel.solution: Omen provides instant translation in 5 languages, letting travelers communicate naturally with locals through speech or the wearable display.

testimonial.quote: Omen transformed my trip to Japan. I could finally have real conversations with locals.
testimonial.author: Frequent Traveler

business.title: Business Meetings
business.challenge: International business meetings require expensive interpreters or suffer from communication barriers that slow negotiations.
business.solution: Omen enables real-time translation during meetings, allowing natural conversation flow without waiting for interpretation.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.challenge: Hearing-impaired individuals and those with speech difficulties need visual aids to participate in conversations.
accessibility.solution: The ESP32 wearable display shows real-time transcriptions and translations, enabling full participation in any conversation.

learning.title: Language Learning
learning.challenge: Language learners need immersive practice but lack access to native speakers for real conversation.
learning.solution: Omen helps learners practice pronunciation, understand native speech, and build confidence through real-world translation assistance.

translationPage.ctaSubtitle: Download Omen and communicate in any language
